title: Rito, pls. (I missed the quest by 10 minutes)

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: Oh no, so close!  ><  I'm not sure if we can assist here, we don't have control over extending missions.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll look into this directly with you and find some options.

I hope you get it dude, I have the same problem :( http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/EUN1/32185494 I would do the mission in just two games but second game ended too late and I missed it. Now I will never have that ward ever again probably. It would make me really happy if riot gave us the reward. rito pls :(((
{{item:3070}}
looks like no one gives a fck :/
